description: Enlarged print of weaving (warp and weft); beige green, black
markings: \'C [inside circle] COMPTOIR DE L\'INDUSTRIE TEXTILE DE FRANCE--ROMANEX DE BOUSSAC--GRAND TEINT TISSY STABILISE--MCMLXV \'corderie\'\'
text: Using the sophisticated technology of the 20th century, the Romanex de Boussac Design Studio created a printed fabric that plays on the popularity of natural fibers, simple handwoven structures and the joy of the simple, uncomplicated life to which they allude.
title: Corderie
